summary: This is an email chain from September 26, 2019, between FBI personnel regarding the creation and verification of an Epstein victim list. The email includes an attachment of a cross-reference list and discusses the need to finalize the list to send out victim notifications.

persons.name: MM II
persons.role: FBI Unit Chief, Victim Services Division, Case Support Unit
persons.context: Appears as the sender of the email providing a cross-reference list for Epstein victims and emphasizing the need to finalize the list for notifications.

connections.description: Both are FBI personnel corresponding about the Epstein victim list, with MM II responding to MS's original request.

events.title: FBI Correspondence on Epstein Victim List
events.description: FBI personnel exchange emails regarding the creation and verification of a cross-referenced list of Epstein victims to facilitate victim notifications.

keyFacts: The FBI's Victim Services Division was actively compiling and cross-referencing a list of Jeffrey Epstein's victims as of September 2019.
The document indicates an ongoing effort to notify victims, which required finalizing the victim list.
The correspondence shows coordination between an FBI Unit Chief in the Case Support Unit and a Victim Specialist in the New York Field Office.
